# CovidSIM.eu Parameters 

This calculator estimates the impact on transmission by case isolation, contact reduction, which can then be used as a paramter on CovidSIM.eu.

Estimation of the impact on transmission by case isolation
This section allows to estimate the impact of case isolation based on a number of chosen parameters. These parameters below can be suggested by default in the interface, but it should be allowed to be changed. With those parameters, the formula calculates the impact on the transmission by applying case isolation.
